name: 白姝玉
objective: 課程旨在增進學生對行動電話通訊網路之了解與實務分析能力，期望學生之所學能與產業科技發展的脈動同步。 內容主要包括： (一) 電信基本簡介 (二) 行動通訊系統之演進與發展 (三) 蜂巢式行動電話網路架構與功能 (四) 臺灣GSM網路運作實例研討 (五) 無線網路之規劃設計實務 (1)信號涵蓋與傳輸速率之量測 (2)通話流量與系統容量分析 (3)頻率規劃與干擾 (六) 系統優化與維運管理 (七)射頻規劃之軟體模擬，在實驗室設備許可之前提下實習網路規劃。
schedule:
Week1-3: Mobile Telecommunication Evolution 
Week4-5: Basic Concept of Wireless Communication
Week6-7: FDMA/TDMA Technology and GSM Infrastructure 
Week8-9: GSM Network Design and Engineering Practice
Week10-11: Network Optimization and Management
Week12: Midterm exam
Week13-14: Signal and transmission measurement
Week15-17: Software simulation
Week18: Final report
scorePolicy:
Midterm exam    30%
Field measurement & software   30%
Final report    40%
materials:
1. Class handout
2.Fundamentals of Telecommunications, 2nd edition, Roger Freeman, Wiley-Interscience.
3.Introduction to Wireless and Mobile Systems, 2nd edition, Agrawal and Zeng, Thomson.
4.Mobile Cellular Telecommunications, 2nd edition, William C.Y. Lee, McGraw Hill.
5.Cellular System Design and Optimization, Smith Gervelis, McGraw Hill.
6.The GSM System for Mobile Communications, Mouly&Pautet. 
7.An Introduction to GSM, Redl, Weber,and Oliphant, Artech House.
